channel.title: Kilobyte
channel.description: A microcast about my thoughts on technology, workflow and the world.
channel.itunes:author: Keegan Sands

item.title: 1: Well Dressed Wookie
item.description:
The debut episode of the new Kilobyte podcast is here.

  • keegsands on Twitter
  • Star Wars Day
  • The Audio Technica ATR-2100
  • Special, thanks to my good friend @alexredsox for helping me test out this podcast.

Thanks for listening
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: The debut episode of the Kilobyte podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode I talk about Star Wars day, job interviews and the struggles of starting a podcast.

item.title: 2: Eddard's Dead Friends
item.description:
The highly anticipated second episode of Kilobyte

  • Hibernate Get vs. Load
  • Java abstract and final
  • Mission to Mars by Franklyn M. Branley
  • Eddard Stark on Game of Thrones Wiki

Thanks for listening
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: The highly anticipated second episode of Kilobyte.
item.itunes:subtitle: Start with a brief update on the podcast and my first follow up. My thoughts on Mars, kid pitch baseball and playing catch.

item.title: 3: Fear of Seagulls
item.description:
I tried to keep it a little shorter this time for a quicker turnaround. No follow up this episode. You get to hear my big complaint about ice cream stands and then the first of my online dating stories from the early 2000's

  • My favorite local ice cream shop, Hodgies
  • Coiled Ice Cream Cone Holder
  • Boston.com
  • Ornithophobia: The Fear of Birds

Have a great day!
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: Ice cream in New England and my first online dating story.
item.itunes:subtitle: In the third episode of Kilobyte, I complain a little about ice cream stands and then talk about my first online date from over a decade ago.

item.title: 4: Pink Eye Bluetooth
item.description:
The fourth episode of Kilobyte where I discuss my fear of certain ailments and my recent experiences with Bluetooth devices.

  • Stellina429 follow-up tweet
  • Microcreamery in Hudson, MA
  • Jabra Move Wireless On Ear Headphones
  • iClever Bluetooth Hands Free
  • Aukey Bluetooth Ear Buds
  • Wikipedia: Conjunctivitis

Have a great day!
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: My fears of conjunctivitis and poison ivy and my experience with Bluetooth
item.itunes:subtitle: The fourth episode of Kilobyte where I discuss my fear of certain ailments and my recent experiences with Bluetooth devices.

item.title: 5: For the Love of Vlog
item.description:
In this episode of Kilobyte I follow up on my Bluetooth situation, complain about local news and have a confession to make about entertainment.

  • Jabra Move Wireless On Ear Headphones
  • My Tweet to Jabra about the headphones
  • WHDH News on Twitter
  • Tweet about state parks
  • Jenna Marbles
  • Julien Solomita
  • Grav3yardgirl
  • CGP Grey
  • How To Basic
  • Slo Mo Guys
  • Katherine Elizabeth

Have a great day!
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: Follow up on my Bluetooth headphones, news teases and a confession.
item.itunes:subtitle: In the latest installment of the podcast I have some follow up on my headphones, an annoyance with the local news and a confession.

item.title: 6: Only Two Hit Batters
item.description:
In this episode of Kilobyte there is an update on the coach pitch baseball situation and my predictions for Apple's WWDC 2016.

  • Apple WWDC Page

Have a great day!
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: Coach pitch baseball updates and my Apple WWDC 2016 predictions.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode of Kilobyte I give an update on my coach pitch baseball team and also delve into the world of technology predictions related to Apple WWDC 2016.

item.title: 7: Double Your Pleasure, Double Your Fun
item.description:
The episode where I talk a lot about Apple's WWDC 2016 and all the platforms.

  • watchOS 3 Preview
  • tvOS 10 Preview
  • macOS Sierra
  • iOS 10 Preview
  • Apple WWDC 2016 Keynote Video
  • Hello Internet Podcast
  • Hello Internet Animated Episode 7: Desktop Icons
  • Cortex Episode 26 with talk about multipadlifestyle Have a great day!

Have a great day!
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: My first annual review of Apple's WWDC where I talk about all the platforms
item.itunes:subtitle: The Apple WWDC 2016 took place this week and I cover each of the platforms and provide my thoughts on all the changes coming to them this fall.

item.title: 8: Out in the Cold
item.description:
A quick follow up on the WWDC podcast, being cold as an adult and my workflow for non work related tasks.

  • Universal Clipboard
  • Hello Internet Episode 39 (not Cortex)
  • Getting Things Done (wikipedia)
  • Apple discoveryd issue

Have a great day!
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: My new fear of being cold and my workflow for outside of work.
item.itunes:subtitle: Quick follow up on the WWDC episode from last week, a brief glimpse into a new fear of being cold and finally a step by step walkthrough of my workflow for tasks at home.

item.title: 9: Gotta Have It
item.description:
Lots of follow up from the WWDC episode and an online dating story.

  • littlenonna on Twitter
  • Apple Watch Workout App Changes
  • Six Colors macOS Sierra Hands On
  • The Talk Show Episode 158 with Craig Federighi and Phil Schiller
  • iOS 10 Slide To Unlock Details
  • Wunderlist
  • The Wirecutter Wifi router reviews

Have a great day!
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: Follow-up from the WWDC episode and an online dating story.
item.itunes:subtitle: Lots of follow-up from the WWDC episode and an online dating story where I was outdone when eating ice cream.

item.title: 10: In Search of Pikachu
item.description:
Talking about iOS 10 Public beta 1 and the latest craze, Pokemon Go!

  • Go Tasks
  • iOS 10 Public Beta
  • Presence Security
  • SixColors iOS 10 public beta article
  • Pokemon Go site
  • Pokemon Go Pikachu Starter Trick
  • Pokemon in the house

Have a great day!
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: The new iOS 10 public beta and the latest craze, Pokemon Go!
item.itunes:subtitle: A little productivity follow up and then my experience with the new iOS 10 public beta. I also give a primer on the new Pokemon Go! Announcing a new listener.

item.title: 11: Oh Canada
item.description:
Special episode recorded in Prince Edward Island, Canada. I talk about my difficulties with limited cellular data and wifi. A visit to the top ice cream place in the world.

  • Saint John, NB (Wikipedia)
  • Prince Edward Island (Wikipedia)
  • Greenwich Cottage
  • Reversing Falls (Wikipedia)
  • ATT Passport Plan
  • Iceland prepaid sim blog
  • Perfect Roaming
  • Anne of Green Gables (Wikipedia)
  • Ripley’s Believe it or not Odditorium at Cavendish Beach
  • Jen at Ripley’s Odditorium
  • Cows Ice cream
  • Cows Ice Cream Top 10 pic
  • Kilobyte: 3 Fear of Gulls
  • Canadian POS Terminal Image Search
  • Lins Takeout

Have a great day!
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: Recording from vacation in Canada and talking about cellular data while traveling.
item.itunes:subtitle: Special episode recorded in Prince Edward Island, Canada. I talk about my difficulties with limited cellular data and wifi. A visit to the top ice cream place in the world.

item.description:
Kaleb joins me on the podcast as we discuss his first concert experience.

item.description:
I discuss my theory on being a fan on something and how it may not be a straight line

item.description:
We started a special tradition and I am sharing it with you.

item.title: 15: Dear Dev Diary
item.description:
We purchased not one, but two drones and I talk about them. I also get back to some workflow stuff and talk about my daily workflow at work.

  • Syma X5C (Kaleb's)
  • DJI Phantom 4 (My Dad's)
  • Hubsan X4 501C (Mine)
  • Drone over Merrimack - shot on Syma X5C (http://youtube.com/keegsands)
  • Mr. Steele (YouTube)
  • Mr. Steele's Freestyle Finals World Drone Prix 2016(YouTube)
  • MarkdownPad 2
  • Markdown (wikipedia)
  • Sample Dev Diary

Have a great day!
item.itunes:author: Keegan Sands
item.itunes:summary: I drone on about drones and then go over my daily workflow at work.
item.itunes:subtitle: I drone on about drones and then go over my daily workflow at work.

item.title: 16: Uncle David Approved
item.description:
First a shout out to my Uncle David and then a deep dive into my thoughts on the September 7th Apple event.

  • Apple See you on the 7th Page

Have a great day!

item.title: 25: Edible Flower
item.description:
Some Apple event follow up including my temporary ownership of an Apple Watch Series 3. The main event is my inadequate history wity music and a new show segment. Don't forget to do the homework.

It's new years resolution time and I am going to try to challenge myself a little. Sorry it doesn't involve me releasing a new podcast every week.

Have a great day!
